title: Glacier
description: Seventeen year-old Carly wanted nothing more than a life of music. She thought that Glacier Talents, an elite boarding school, was the place for her. That was until she found out that there was more to this school than what met the eye. Suddenly, Carly finds herself within the center of a supernatural world, where she must cope with the realities of becoming a vampire. But just as she is beginning to adjust, a dark secret is revealed, which causes everything to change.
author: Beth  Lynn
